trans-unit.source: The state of an entity object.
The object context must know the state of an object to save changes back to the data source.
<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry> objects store EntityState information.
The `SaveChanges` methods of the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> process entities that are attached to the context and update the data source depending on the EntityState of each object.
For more information, see [Creating, Adding, Modifying, and Deleting Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f76f1fad-c553-4b59-820b-89b3dec2fad1).
The state of objects inside an object context is managed by the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>.

To find out the state of an object, call one of the following <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager> methods: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager.TryGetObjectStateEntry%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager.GetObjectStateEntry%2A>, or <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager.GetObjectStateEntries%2A>.
The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry.State%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry> defines the state of the object.
The object is new, has been added to the object context, and the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges*> method has not been called.
After the changes are saved, the object state changes to Unchanged.
Objects in the Added state do not have original values in the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref>.
To be added.
The object has been deleted from the object context.
After the changes are saved, the object state changes to Detached.
To be added.
The object exists but is not being tracked.
An entity is in this state immediately after it has been created and before it is added to the object context.

An entity is also in this state after it has been removed from the context by calling the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Detach*> method or if it is loaded by using a <xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption.NoTracking><xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref>.
There is no <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref> instance associated with objects in the Detached state.
To be added.

One of the scalar properties on the object was modified and the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges*> method has not been called. In POCO entities without change-tracking proxies, the state of the modified properties changes to Modified when the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.DetectChanges*> method is called.
After the changes are saved, the object state changes to Unchanged.
To be added.
The object has not been modified since it was attached to the context or since the last time that the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges*> method was called.
To be added.
